meanings.definition: Relating to the physiological processes associated with disease.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained the pathophysiologic changes happening in the patient's body.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the pathophysiologic mechanisms of cancer development.
meanings.sent3: The pathophysiologic dance between illness and health is complex.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a pathophysiologic puzzle, unraveling with each medical test.
meanings.sent5: The pathophysiologic storm within him raged on, causing chaos in his body.

meanings.sent1: The pathophysiologic symptoms were evident in the patient's test results.
meanings.sent2: The medication aimed to correct the pathophysiologic imbalance in his body.
meanings.sent3: His pathophysiologic quirks made him a unique medical case.
meanings.sent4: The pathophysiologic clock in her body seemed to tick at a different pace.
meanings.sent5: The pathophysiologic anomaly puzzled even the most experienced doctors.
